funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.io

Class WaveFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • funkatronics.code.tactilewaves.io.WaveFormat

  • public class WaveFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    WaveFormat Class for specifying various audio format parameters of some audio data

    Currently, only PCM (Linear Quantization, Uncompressed) Encoding is supported.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WaveFormat AndroidFormat(int sampleRate)
      Returns a WaveFormat with the default Android format (16 bit mono Big Endian PCM)
      int getBitDepth()
      Gets the bit depth (bits/sample) of the audio with this format
      int getBytesPerSample()
      Gets the bytes used per sample of the audio with this format
      int getChannels()
      Gets the number of channels of the audio with this format 1 = Mono 2 = Stereo 3+ usually indicates some type of surround sound or custom channel configuration
      int getEncoding()
      Gets the encoding method constant for the audio with this format
      int getSampleRate()
      Gets the sample rate of the audio with this format
      boolean isBigEndian()
      Reports if the audio data is stored in big-endian byte order

      Returns a WaveFormat with the standard Microsoft WAVE format (Little Endian PCM)

    • Constructor Detail

      • WaveFormat

        public WaveFormat(int encoding,
                  java.lang.Boolean bigEndian,
                  int sampleRate,
                  int bitDepth,
                  int channels)
        Constructs a WaveFormat with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        encoding - the method of encoding used in the format
        bigEndian - the endian-ness of the audio data (false = little-endian)
        sampleRate - the number of samples per second
        bitDepth - the number of bits per sample
        channels - the number of channels in the audio stream

    • Method Detail

      • MSWAVEFormat

        public static WaveFormat MSWAVEFormat(int sampleRate,
                                      int bitDepth,
                                      int channels)
        Returns a WaveFormat with the standard Microsoft WAVE format (Little Endian PCM)
        Parameters:
        sampleRate - the sample rate to use in this format
        bitDepth - the number of bits/sample to use in this format
        channels - the number of channels to use in this format
        Returns:
        a WaveFormat with the default Microsoft WAVE audio format parameters

      • AndroidFormat

        public static WaveFormat AndroidFormat(int sampleRate)
        Returns a WaveFormat with the default Android format (16 bit mono Big Endian PCM)
        Parameters:
        sampleRate - the sample rate to use in this format
        Returns:
        a WaveFormat with the default Android audio format parameters

        public int getEncoding()
        Gets the encoding method constant for the audio with this format

        public boolean isBigEndian()
        Reports if the audio data is stored in big-endian byte order
        Returns:
        True if big-endian, False if little-endian
